newsitem.title: USA: Easco Inc Q4 shr loss vs profit.
newsitem.headline: Easco Inc Q4 shr loss vs profit.

text.p: (In thousands, except share and per share data)

NOTE - (A) On a pro forma basis, after giving effect to the company's common stock offering on April 21, 1995, as if it had occurred on January 1, 1995, for the three months ended December 31, 1995 net income and the weighted average number of common shares outstanding would have been unchanged.

For the year ended December 31, 1995, net income and the weighted average number of common shares outstanding would increase by $250,000 and 698,630, respectively, and net income per common share would decrease by $0.08.

(B) Earnings (loss) per share amounts include after tax, non-cash LIFO income of $0.08 and $0.15 per share for the three months ended December 31, 1996 and 1995, respectively, and $0.19 and $0.11 per share for the years ended December 31, 1996 and 1995, respectively.
